snippet: In a third week of protest against the government, the demonstrations in greater Khartoum and other Sudanese cities have remained small but show signs of gathering momentum.
lead_paragraph: In a third week of protest against the government, the demonstrations in greater Khartoum and other Sudanese cities have remained small but show signs of gathering momentum.

headline.seo: In Sudan, Protesters Clash With the Riot Police
headline.main: Protesters and the Police Clash in Sudan
headline.print_headline: Protesters and the Police Clash in Sudan
